dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kazakhstan's President Tokayev just had a meeting with the OSCE Chairperson, Elina Valtonen.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazakhstan's President Tokayev just had a meeting with the O S C E Chairperson, Elina Valtonen.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstan's President, Kassym-Jomart Tokayev, met with the current OSCE Chairperson, Elina Valtonen, to discuss the values that Kazakhstan upholds, citing a statement from the Akorda press service.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, she's from Finland, isn't she? Took on that role during a pretty tough time for global security.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, she's from Finland, isn't she? Took on that role during a pretty tough time for global security.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tokayev expressed his support for the work of Elina Valtonen, who took on the role of OSCE Chairperson amidst a challenging global and regional security landscape.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and he brought up the 50th anniversary of the Helsinki Final Actâ€”called it the cornerstone of European security.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and he brought up the fiftieth anniversary of the Helsinki Final Act-called it the cornerstone of European security.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "This year marks the 50th anniversary of the Helsinki Final Act. Half a century later, this document remains the cornerstone of European security, enshrining key principles such as sovereignty, territorial integrity, and respect for human rights.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's a big deal, you know, principles like sovereignty and human rights. And Tokayev emphasized Kazakhstan's commitment to those values.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a big deal, you know, principles like sovereignty and human rights. And Tokayev emphasized Kazakhstan's commitment to those values.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Half a century later, this document remains the cornerstone of European security, enshrining key principles such as sovereignty, territorial integrity, and respect for human rights. Kazakhstan firmly adheres to these fundamental values," said Tokayev.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: He also praised Kazakh-Finnish relations, said Finland's been a long-standing partner in the Nordic area.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He also praised Kazakh-Finnish relations, said Finland's been a long-standing partner in the Nordic area.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He also praised the state of Kazakh-Finnish relations, emphasizing that Finland has been a long-standing partner for Kazakhstan in the Nordic region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And Valtonen really highlighted Kazakhstan's growing role as an influential middle power, especially through its work with the OSCE.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Valtonen really highlighted Kazakhstan's growing role as an influential middle power, especially through its work with the O S C E.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "I commend your efforts to enhance Kazakhstan's international reputation, through which the country has positioned itself as an influential middle power in the region and the world. Kazakhstan's credibility is strengthened through active participation in organizations such as the OSCE.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: She specifically mentioned their cooperation in economic and environmental sectors through the OSCE Program Office in Astana.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: She specifically mentioned their cooperation in economic and environmental sectors through the O S C E Program Office in Astana.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We sincerely appreciate your proactive role during these challenging times, especially in the economic and environmental sectors. Cooperation with the OSCE Program Office in Astana has been highly fruitful," she stated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It sounds like both sides are really keen on deepening that partnership. Tokayev even sent warm wishes to Finland's President Stubb.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It sounds like both sides are really keen on deepening that partnership. Tokayev even sent warm wishes to Finland's President Stubb.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the end of the meeting, President Tokayev sent warm wishes to Finnish President Alexander Stubb and reaffirmed Kazakhstan's readiness to work closely with Finland to strengthen the friendship and cooperation between the two nations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, reaffirming readiness to strengthen friendship between the nations. Seems like a solid diplomatic moment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, reaffirming readiness to strengthen friendship between the nations. Seems like a solid diplomatic moment.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the end of the meeting, President Tokayev sent warm wishes to Finnish President Alexander Stubb and reaffirmed Kazakhstan's readiness to work closely with Finland to strengthen the friendship and cooperation between the two nations.
